item.description:
We have had awesome conditions this year and if you're purposefully staying away from the mountains due to the upcoming holiday and the kids school vacation this is the weekend to reclaim your favorite trails! We have a weekend of fun planned and now would be a great time to come check out the lodge if you haven't already.

Our lodge is in Bartlett, NH just 2 miles from Attitash and close to Wildcat, Black, Bretton Woods & Cranmore. Even Sunday River is only 45 minutes away.

Guests are welcome for $20 per night lodging at the club. Full details and information will be sent to all Yes RSVPs.

All members and guests must be 21+

Hope to see you up north!
item.name: Weekend at the Bretts - February 25 - 27, 2011
